Property Type: Residential, Single Family Style: Two Level, Contemporary Year Built: 1998 Community: Buena Park County: Orange MLS#: P807632 Source: CRMLS Status: Pending This listing is set to close and all contingencies have been fulfilled. The lender, the escrow agent or attorney are processing the loan and title documents to make sure the deal will close on time. On Redfin: 189 days Sign In to See More Home Details '''HOUSE SUBJECT TO SHORT SALE''' PRIVATE GATED '''LAKESIDE''' COMMUNITY. THE HOUSE APPEAL IN CUL-DE-SAC, in quiet area. Great wide-open floor with CATHEDRAL CEILING. All bedrooms are up, bright and light, open kitchen with granite countertops, highly upgraded house. Backyard, professionaly landscaped with fountain, three car garage with built in cabinets. Bedroom Information
